post:
Hello LET community,

Here is our March special. These are OpenVZ/SolusVM and will be provisioned in Los Angeles at Quadranet.

**VPS TWO Plan**

**256MB** Guaranteed/384MB Burstable RAM
15GB RAID 10 Storage
400GB Transfer
Free Instant Setup
**$4**/month with PROMO CODE "**SPRING2**"

**VPS THREE Plan**

**512MB** Guaranteed/768MB Burstable RAM
25GB RAID 10 Storage
500GB Transfer
Free Instant Setup
**$5.50**/month with PROMO CODE "**SPRING3**"

If you have any questions, feel free to contact us (thru the site ideally; you will get a faster response).

Thanks!
